metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13743 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: There is a buffer overflow in Liblouis 3.2.0, triggered in the function _lou_showString() in utils.c, that will lead to a remote denial of service attack.

notes.Note: ratliff> errors out rather than crashing without ASAN leosilva> changing for ignored since it's an ASAN report and we aren't updating this right now

criterions.comment: liblouis: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
